summary.para: Indicates whether the drop target is intends to handle the evaluation of the enterprise protection policy.

param.name: value
param.para: A boolean value that indicates whether the drop target intends to handle the evaluation of enterprise protection policy.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides the drop target with the enterprise ID of the drop source.

param.name: identity
param.para: The enterprise identity of the drop source.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: When implemented by the drop target application, this interface gives the OLE drag and drop engine the ability to determine whether the drop target application intends to evaluate enterprise protection policy and gives the OLE drag and drop engine a way to provide the enterprise ID of the drop source application to the drop target application.
